item.title: Evaluating the potential impact of higher-dose and adjuvanted seasonal influenza vaccines in adults age 65 and older on influenza burden in the United States (submitted)
Presentation to ACIP on recommending higher-dose and adjuvanted seasonal influenza vaccines for adults 65+
item.description: Work presented to the Advisory Committee on Immunization Practices (ACIP) that modeled the potential impact of recommending high-dose, adjuvanted and recombinant vaccines to adults aged 65 and over on seasonal influenza burden in the United States.

item.title: Analysis of multi-level spatial data reveals strong synchrony in seasonal influenza epidemics across Norway, Sweden, and Denmark
